title:
ApplicationTree holds nodes which belongs to the application
TODO: describe purpose of this type

hosts.title: Hosts holds list of Kubernetes nodes that run application related pods

items.title:
HostInfo holds host name and resources metrics
TODO: describe purpose of this type
TODO: describe members of this type

systemInfo.description: NodeSystemInfo is a set of ids/uuids to uniquely identify the node.

architecture.title: The Architecture reported by the node

bootID.description: Boot ID reported by the node.

containerRuntimeVersion.description: ContainerRuntime Version reported by the node through runtime remote API (e.g. containerd://1.4.2).

kernelVersion.description: Kernel Version reported by the node from 'uname -r' (e.g. 3.16.0-0.bpo.4-amd64).

kubeProxyVersion.description: KubeProxy Version reported by the node.

kubeletVersion.description: Kubelet Version reported by the node.

machineID.title:
MachineID reported by the node. For unique machine identification
in the cluster this field is preferred. Learn more from man(5)
machine-id: http://man7.org/linux/man-pages/man5/machine-id.5.html

operatingSystem.title: The Operating System reported by the node

osImage.description: OS Image reported by the node from /etc/os-release (e.g. Debian GNU/Linux 7 (wheezy)).

systemUUID.title:
SystemUUID reported by the node. For unique machine identification
MachineID is preferred. This field is specific to Red Hat hosts
https://access.redhat.com/documentation/en-us/red_hat_subscription_management/1/html/rhsm/uuid

nodes.description: Nodes contains list of nodes which either directly managed by the application and children of directly managed nodes.

items.title:
ResourceNode contains information about live resource and its children
TODO: describe members of this type

createdAt.description:
Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct
marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many
of the factory methods that the time package offers.

+protobuf.options.marshal=false
+protobuf.as=Timestamp
+protobuf.options.(gogoproto.goproto_stringer)=false

health.title: HealthStatus contains information about the currently observed health state of an application or resource

message.title: Message is a human-readable informational message describing the health status

status.title: Status holds the status code of the application or resource

items.title: InfoItem contains arbitrary, human readable information about an application

name.description: Name is a human readable title for this piece of information.

networkingInfo.title:
ResourceNetworkingInfo holds networking resource related information
TODO: describe members of this type

externalURLs.description: ExternalURLs holds list of URLs which should be available externally. List is populated for ingress resources using rules hostnames.

items.description:
LoadBalancerIngress represents the status of a load-balancer ingress point:
traffic intended for the service should be sent to an ingress point.

hostname.title:
Hostname is set for load-balancer ingress points that are DNS based
(typically AWS load-balancers)
+optional

ip.title:
IP is set for load-balancer ingress points that are IP based
(typically GCE or OpenStack load-balancers)
+optional

ports.title:
Ports is a list of records of service ports
If used, every port defined in the service should have an entry in it
+listType=atomic
+optional

error.title:
Error is to record the problem with the service port
The format of the error shall comply with the following rules:
- built-in error values shall be specified in this file and those shall use
  CamelCase names
- cloud provider specific error values must have names that comply with the
  format foo.example.com/CamelCase.
---
The regex it matches is (dns1123SubdomainFmt/)?(qualifiedNameFmt)
+optional
+kubebuilder:validation:Required
+kubebuilder:validation:Pattern=`^([a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?(\.[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?)*/)?(([A-Za-z0-9][-A-Za-z0-9_.]*)?[A-Za-z0-9])$`
+kubebuilder:validation:MaxLength=316

port.title: Port is the port number of the service port of which status is recorded here

protocol.title:
Protocol is the protocol of the service port of which status is recorded here
The supported values are: "TCP", "UDP", "SCTP"

items.title: ResourceRef includes fields which uniquely identify a resource
ResourceRef includes fields which uniquely identify a resource

allOf.title: ResourceRef includes fields which uniquely identify a resource

orphanedNodes.description: OrphanedNodes contains if or orphaned nodes: nodes which are not managed by the app but in the same namespace. List is populated only if orphaned resources enabled in app project.
